s: Summary: VNTR Investor Forum gathers global angels, LPs, family offices and CVCs for curated discussions on 2026 venture capital trends and co‑investment opportunities.
Topics: Venture capital allocation, co‑investment structures, global capital flows, sectoral hot spots, deal‑room dynamics.
Speakers: Prominent global investors (names not listed).
r: Access high‑quality deal flow in a peer‑only environment.
Engage in deep‑dive roundtables on emerging investment theses.
Build strategic alliances with fellow capital allocators.
